title: Water Vapor Concentration Calculation
description:
DEW_CON calculates from the relative humidity (RH) and 

temperature (T in °C) water vapor concentration in the air. The result is 

calculated in grams/m³. RH is shown in % (50 = 50%) and indicates the 

temperature in °C.

The module is suitable for temperatures from -40°C to +90°C.
name: DEW_CON

output.name: REAL
output.description: Water vapor concentration in grams per cubic meter (g/m³)

return_value.description: Returns the calculated water vapor concentration in g/m³
